body_html: @drpngx I mean writing TFRecord file with MR and Spark directly (e.g. to HDFS/GCS or customized file system which can be accessed by tensorflow), avoiding unnecessary and slow data conversion in the python code. We have some code to make this possible and would like to contribute if applicable.
